text: The Cadillac Brougham was a full-size luxury sedan Manufactured by Cadillac the luxury brand of General Motors from 1987 to 1992, it represented the last of Cadillac's rear-wheel-drive full-size sedans. It is know for its luxury features and The Brougham was introduced as a replacement for the previous Cadillac Fleetwood Brougham, which had been in production since the early 1980s it was suceceed by the deville in 1992. Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Brougham Category:Sedans
title: Cadillac Brougham
